item.title: Start
item.description:
This site was created as a means to compile all the knowledge I've shared on various social media platforms in hopes to provide a less fragmented resource for those seeking to learn subdivision modeling.
It also acts as my personal portfolio, both to show my art and to demonstrate teaching and documentation skillsets. Over time, I will add to this with the intent on also including an interactive guide to two of my most passionate life skills: Problem Solving and Critical Thinking,
For me, learning is an endless pursuit. Embracing mistakes, comparing notes with others, discovery though empirical study, and pushing myself into uncomfortable situations.
It is also about enabling others to learn and discover for themselves. We often seek out artists with existing passion for what they do, but I challenge this. Instead of looking for passion in individuals, we should focus on inspiring passion in people who show capacity and promise.
